review_text: Lynn was a fantastic host. The apartment is nicely appointment with nice e furnishings and I felt right at home. I really enjoyed the most comfort bed I've slept on while away from home and the front porch. The area is so quiet and peaceful, yet convenient to the main streets in an out of town. I would highly recommend and will stay here again while I'm visiting the area.

We were in the area for a graduation so did not spend much time on the property. There seems to be a lot to do in the area, went to Moro’s Table for dinner and highly recommend. Food was delicious. Paul was very responsive, the house was very comfortable and clean. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend!

We really enjoyed staying in the red barn. It was a beautiful home in a beautiful location, and very easy to book and to navigate. Paul was very accommodating and communicative from our first inquiry. Absolutely would recommend.

When we arrive, we were meant by pollen Amy they were very nice and willing to do anything that we may have needed. They had the fireplace already set outside with one. The location was perfect for us to stay. Our daughter got married in the area would highly recommend.
We had a wonderful stay! Beautiful home and very comfortable for our family. Paul is an amazing host and was very welcoming. We look forward to returning next year!

The Red Barn was perfect for our family. It had more than enough space for four adults and there was enough bed space for two more adults. I highly recommend this Airbnb and hope to stay there again in the future. It is nearby local NY lakes and has ample parking spaces for multiple drivers. Paul was a very gracious and considerate host with nice surprises waiting for us inside the house. We had a great experience!

We had a great stay here with our kids. Family friendly; the yard is huge and offers plenty of space to play. The house is clean and very well stocked with all the essentials and more. Would stay here again the next time we are in the area!
Very nice place. Close to all the historical sites, and restaurants in Auburn. Spacious for a family of 5 adults.

We loved our stay at Paul's barn! After our first night, we went ahead and extended for an extra day because we had such a nice stay there. From being welcomed with local wine (that we did eventually drink, thank you Paul), to the clean and cozy rooms, to quick and responsive communication throughout our stay including local recommendations, Paul is providing exactly the experience you would want from a local airbnb host. We'd definitely stay again!
Great stay with my family (two young kids). Comfortable home perfect size for us for 5 days. Paul was very responsive and friendly throughout our stay. Would definitely recommend!

The barn was wonderful, so peaceful and beautiful. It is like this secret sanctuary that you walk into, with a beautiful garden, fire pit and surroundings to look out on. Our kids saw fireflies for the first time! We all enjoyed the extensive library, cozy couch and the treats that were left in the fridge! It was very clean and comfortable. We would love to go back for another stay!

We loved staying at the Red Barn! It was super clean, neat and very cozy. Paul had a very easy system to check in. Beautiful location with beautiful views and a great built-in library for book lovers. We would definitely stay here again in future trips to the Skaneatales area! Thank you so much Paul for our wonderful weekend experience!

My parents and grandparents had a lovely stay at the barn when visiting the area for Cornell’s commencement weekend! It was the perfect place, comfortable and convenient. The area had a lot to do and see, and Paul and Amy were a delight!
Great place, very clean & cozy. Perfect for our needs and Paul was very communicative and friendly. Totally satisfied.
The location was perfect. The home was clean and cozy. Could not have asked for anything better.

Loved our stay here! The foliage was perfect and it was so nice to sit around the fire pit or on the porch and take it all in. The home was very spacious and clean and the kitchen was stocked with all the cookware we needed.
A pleasant drive to Syracuse and surrounding destinations.

We spent a beautiful October weekend at the red barn. Check in and check out was seamless. Host Paul is very communicative, and offered us some terrific suggestions for local attractions and restaurants. He also provided a nice personal touch by leaving a chilled bottle of wine for my sister's birthday. The barn is so charming - and also very comfortable and clean. We hope to return!

The Red Barn was perfect for our stay in the finger lakes.
The location was within 30 minutes of anywhere we wanted to go.
The house was very clean and had everything we needed for our stay.
The next time we will travel to this area we will stay there.
Paul is a great host, and was in direct communications with us throughout the whole process.

Paul’s barn was such a fun and unique place to stay in during our visit to FLX! Super comfortable for two couples to stay in - can cook, relax, and unwind ! Close to Skaneatles, a bit of a drive to the wineries we selected to visit but still quite convenient! Wish we could have stayed for a couple more days to enjoy the backyard, deck, and fire pit! Paul was extremely flexible with any requests and asks, which makes him a great super host! Thanks for having us!
Really nice and homey place. Road noise didnt fit the charm of the place. Very nice people. Would return despite the traffic.
The barn was a wonderful place to stay! It was clean, private, and had comfortable beds. Paul was incredibly friendly and the property was peaceful. Would recommend!
Paul’s place was great! I will definitely stay there again in the future. Paul himself was great, communicated great and had no issues with any request!

Such a unique stay! We loved the barn and it was spacious. Paul was a great host and communicative.
We hope to return and stay longer next time.
Thank you
Great house, beautiful property and very attentive and accommodating host.
Lovely house outside of Auburn. Good outdoor space. Can hear a bit of road noise while outside but inside is very quiet. Definitely recommend for a nice getaway.

Paul’s place was wonderful. It was in a perfect location. You are close enough to everything you would want to do but you are also far enough away for it to be private and peaceful. The place was stocked with everything you would need. Our favorite part was hanging around the pit fire every night and playing cornhole
We loved the converted barn. It had everything we needed and was very clean. The outdoor space was perfect. Our stay was excellent.

The Barn was a perfect home base for our family’s trip to the Auburn area. It is very spacious and just a fun space! We had easy access to several of the finger lakes and activities there. The host was very responsive and helpful with info about the area. We loved having our own personal outdoor firepit. Overall, we definitely recommend this airbnb and would not hesitate to stay here again.

We had an awesome time here as we came to the area for a family wedding. Paul had some great suggestions for us to do as a family the day after the wedding and we had a blast. My son loved staying "in the barn". My wife loved its rustic appearence and feel. Spacious enough for six guests, a nice property with a deck and firepit outback to enjoy your breakfast. In the country but only a 10 minute drive to get essentials and a 20 minute drive to some fun! This was our first time staying at an air bnb and it set the bar high. We look forward to a return to the barn for the next family event.
Adorable barn. Nice landscaping. Great for two couples. Paul is a terrific host and has lots of great suggestions for things to do at his property or close by lakes and towns.
We had a lovely time there. Paul made sure the snow did not impede our comings and goings! He was very attentive and pleasant.

The Red Barn was quite cute and cozy! My Artist friends and I were in town for Quilts=Arts=Quilts to see one of my art quilts in the exhibit. Amy & Paul made our stay quite fun with a bottle of wine and a fresh picked pumpkin. Very clean and cozy. This will be on our picks for next year! Thank you for all your hospitality! Deb Berkebile

The Red Barn is a beautiful, historical, and comfortable home. My small family including a kid and service pup, were very comfortable.
Even through a tornado warning and severe lightening storm we were dry, warm, and felt very safe. The barn is 100 years old and surrounded by gorgeous fields, a deck, and garden.
The kitchen is small but stoked with everything. We made several meals and even baked fresh bread and brownies!
The location is excellent for exploring the finger lake region. We visited waterfalls and the Cornell Botanical Gardens. We stretched out on the comfy rugs, played games at the dining room table, and watched the day come and go out the big windows looking out in all directions. Beds were very comfortable, lots of extra linens and towels available.
We felt the love of past generations as we looked through the vast library and diverse book titles. The big dictionary was very fun to flip through! It’s a real mini-library right there in the living room.
We highly recommend the Red Barn and believe it will be one of the more popular AirBnbs in the area once the word gets out.
Thank you!

The place is very clean it doesn’t even look like a barn, and the people are very organized and very helpful even to suggest anything in the Neigbour hood , they even have a printed out bookelet to see what you can get around you with a 10 mile radius,

AMAZING!! Absolutely THE best AirBnB we have stayed in. So cozy, inviting, good location to explore the Fingerlakes. So clean, we even used the bathtub, which we don't usually do. Kitchen was well stocked and even had Parchment paper! Paul and Amy were extremely quick, within minutes, in responding to texts and questions. We are sure Paul's parents would be proud of their home, serving travelers. Wish we would have had more time to read some of their books! Fabulous home!!!!

Timothy’s place was fantastic! Very quiet in a quiet neighborhood with beautiful houses. He has private, shaded parking. It’s a very short walk to some great restaurants, and Timothy’s recommendations were spot on!

This was one of my favorite Airbnb rentals. A beautiful house on a beautiful street! The apartment was lovely and private. Very clean and comfortable. The spectacular and very old beech tree that you can see from all of the windows was a real treat for me. Timothy was easy to communicate with. I’ll be back!

Tim's Airbnb was exactly as pictured and perfect as our home base for the weekend. It was walking distance to restaurants in Auburn, as well as Wegmans. The bed was comfortable and I appreciated all the little touches. Tim was a great and responsive host. I would definitely stay here again!
Every thing was great! the only complaint that I did have was the bath towels. Only 2 very small and thin towels for a 4 night stay with 2 people.
Having stayed in this home before the transformation that Timothy made to this “apartment “ was outstanding. The bed was one of the best I have slept in. Thank you thank you. Amazing
We had a wonderful stay. Timothy was a responsive host and the place had character. Only two blocks from William Seward house which we also recommend for a tour.

I had a lovely and peaceful stay at Timothy’s! The apartment was beautiful and clean, with great lighting and pretty decor. It’s located in a safe and central location and Timothy’s communication was excellent. Would definitely stay here again!

The House was easy to find and simple to get into. The apartment is wonderfully appointed, and comfortable. The location is walkable into town and Timothy’s communication was great. His guidance on Auburn and questions about the parking, the apartment and places to eat. Would definitely book again!

Timothy’s apartment is located in a beautiful home on a picturesque street right in the middle of Auburn. It is well appointed and very comfortable. There is a magnificent tree outside the huge windows, and you can see it from the bedroom and the living room. The king-sized bed is comfortable, and there is an easy to use gas fireplace in the bedroom. All in all the place is peaceful, comfortable, and homey. Timothy and his family are very friendly and helpful. All in all it was an excellent stay. Thank you!

We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is beautiful and on the second floor. We loved the king size bed. The bathroom is rather small but it worked fine for us. The apartment is really cute and has a nice balcony.
This place is cozy, cute, and comfortable. It was perfect for what we were looking for. The location is also just around the corner from many shops and restaurants... all in walking distance.

The place was perfect for someone traveling, family coming in, and overflow of guests…The bed was very comfortable and the blankets cozy way better than any hotel in Auburn!!! Loved the small kitchen, just enough to cool drinks and snacks. Keurig coffee maker…lots of pillows, fabulous sunlight from large windows!!!

Timothy was a great host who communicated very well and made everything very easy. It was a very pleasant, clean, and cozy place with great privacy. The location was good - a short walk to restaurants, coffee places, groceries, and more. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would be very happy to stay there again. Highly recommend.

Timothy’s place is such a gem. Absolutely stunning home, the private balcony on our apartment was amazing. The bed was so comfortable and the working gas fireplace in the bedroom was a major bonus! Highly recommend!
The apartment was clean and had a great modern feel in an old home. Timothy was a great host and was very helpful with making us feel welcome there.
Had another great stay! Everything was perfect, only complaint was the hot water ran cold rather quickly on our last night there, but otherwise a great stay!!

My stay at Timothy’s place was wonderful. The apartment was so beautifully decorated, cozy, and had everything I needed to have a comfortable stay. The home that the apartment is in is stunning and I loved seeing how it was being restored. Hope to stay here again soon!
Beautifully decorated apartment. Very cozy weekend away, i would definetly stay again!
Lovely place!

Lovely old Victorian home beautifully furnished cozy clean . Host responded quickly helpful
And friendly
I will definitely come back . Highly recommend
The Sintra was an amazing spot for a few nights. We felt right at home, and Timothy was an excellent host. It was perfect!
Great stay in clean, stylish space. I would recommend to friends and family without reservation.
We are very happy we choose to stay at Tim’s listing. The house and room were both beautiful and very very clean. Tim himself was very nice and went out of his way to make us feel at home.
Lovely, cozy apartment. Timothy was kind and communicative
Very nice host! Lovely space! I can’t wait until all the renovations are done!!

We truly enjoyed our stay in the Sinatra unit!The ambience is so relaxing and peaceful. We also loved the intricate details that still remain in this historic home.
Timothy was very responsive and kind. We highly recommend staying here, it’s lovely.
Second time staying here and I’d love to come back. Super easy to check in and out. House is gorgeous and very comfortable.

Timothy’s place was beautiful, comfortable, and peaceful. We were only there for 1 night but wish we had more time. He was very communicative and helpful and everything about the stay was perfect. Thank you!

Beautiful old house being renovated as separate apartments. Incredible tree out front and good location. My perception of the apartment was influenced by the weather when I was in Auburn. It was cold and rainy and since it was a Sunday and Monday, the few attractions in town were closed. Might be an excellent apartment to come and go from, but not great for hanging out in. Uneven heating, not super comfortable furniture made it less than ideal for our stay. But better weather might have made it perfectly pleasant.

Beautiful place! Really nicely decorated and home like. Pleasantly surprised that it’s so walkable to the small city historic sites and a grocery store. Really nice street. Easy to communicate with host. Would stay again!

We had a great stay in this beautiful old Victorian. Clean, comfy, having a kitchen and a great grocery store within an easy walk was very convenient. So much to do in the area and you are close to it all. Would definitely stay again.
Timothy was very responsive and hospitable.
Great space great Coast beautiful home
Classic Old Auburn Charm. Peaceful & quiet with a convenient location

Beautifully appointed apartment in an elegant Victorian home. The neighborhood was lovely. Timothy was very friendly and accommodating…a super host. It was a perfect space for a long weekend. I particularly enjoyed the balcony, the amazing big windows and the backyard area. I hope to be back next time I’m visiting the area!

My bestie and I do an annual fall weekend trip, always somewhere in NY. Timothy's apartment in Auburn, located in a beautiful old Victorian home, was the perfect place to relax and unwind. We stayed in the apartment called Sintra - it has a lovely balcony to sit with your coffee in the morning when the weather is nice, tall, gorgeous windows that do open, a full bedroom with room-darkening curtains, and a pull-out couch/bed in the main living area. We pulled out the couch and made up the bed for movie nights, and then afterward, we each had a private place to sleep. This home is located in a very nice, walkable neighborhood. We walked everywhere we went while here, and visited a few parks in the area as well as a very nice restaurant roughly a 10-minute walk away. There is a Wegmans, literally a 2 minute walk away, and a small fridge for perishables in the apartment, which was plenty of space for our needs. We LOVED this space. Stay here if you can!
I will always choose to stay here when I’m working in Aurburn. Timothy is one of the best hosts and the apartment and location are absolutely perfect.
The place was in a cozy envionment, no no noise from the outside. Extremely comfortable inside the apartment. I'd definitely like to stay at his place again when I am in the area.
Timothy’s place was clean, comfy, and convenient. He was very responsive and easy to communicate with!

This quaint space was beautifully decorated and comfortable! The bed was so cozy. Tim was extremely responsive and provided recommendations via messenger very quickly when I had questions. Check in, and check out were a breeze. Thanks, Tim!

Perfect spot for a perfect vacation. Loved everything about the home. Beautiful Victorian in a lovely neighborhood convenient to everything. Great loxation in tbe finger lakes makes it easy to see and do whatever you want. Can't say enough good things about it. Wonderful responsive hosts.
Absolutely loved it here! Looks exactly like the pictures, comfy bed, clean, and all around good vibes. Would definitely stay again :)

Tim was a kind host. Quaint and homely stay. Very chic and comfortable. Close to nearby attractions and stores. Tim recommended a great restaurant and the food was delicious. I look forward to staying here in the future.
This Airbnb is in an absolutely gorgeous Victorian home with a beautiful yard. The apartment was exactly as pictured and was clean and comfortable. I would stay here again if the opportunity arose.

Charmingly decorated , functional, just the right size. I was pleasantly surprised to discover a small swimming pool. The hosts were friendly, personable, and responsive to requests. I would definitely return.
Great spot. Quiet and easy to walk to several places in town. Short drive to a lot of beautiful spots. Host was very friendly and responsive. Will definitely stay here again if I’m ever back!

Timothy was super flexible both for our check-in as well as our check-out. His place is a super cute victorian in a quiet, safe, clean neighborhood that has easy access to downtown and Route 20. I would definitely go back if I'm in the area. We enjoyed our stay!

The air bnb was beautiful. It was in an old Victorian home, and didn’t expect much but when you went inside it was beautifully decorated. Very chic. Had all the necessities and had a sharp knife too, generally all air bnbs have dull knives.
The street is peaceful and only a 3 minute walk to the supermarket which was nice since the fridge is small and couldn’t over stock.
I would definitely come stay here again.
Great location, can walk to everything in downtown, central to drive around the finger lakes. Place was comfortable and cozy.

This was a wonderful little place to stay with my two kids. The place itself was very clean and elegantly decorated. We had everything we needed and anytime I had a question, Tim responded very quickly. This place was reasonably priced and affordable for those of us who make a moderate income. We hope to stay here again at our next visit to this area. Thank you Tim for everything!!
A gem in downtown Auburn. Walkable to both the Seward and Tubman sites, as well as the grocery store and restaurants. A great base-camp to explore all the finger lakes has to offer.
Great stay in a home with a ton of character, super centrally located in Auburn - would absolutely recommend!
We loved our time in this beautiful home! It was peaceful and quiet, a much needed getaway. We absolutely loved the deck, we spent quite a bit of time enjoying it!

Tim's place was Awesome. The apartment was clean and had plenty of kitchen utensils. The only thing I was expecting was a big fridge but there was a mini fridge which was nice. We traveled with a cooler so was able to get ice from Wegmans which is like 1-2 min away to store other things. Tim is Very responsive and makes sure you have everything you need. Everyone we came across was super friendly. I'd definitely stay here again.
Timothy was super responsive and his place is centrally located, quiet and peaceful. We appreciated his attentiveness and care.

It was the perfect place to relax in between my son’s Auburn Doubledays baseball games. Check in was super easy with clear instructions. We felt right at home in this comfortable space. Tastefully decorated, quiet and perfect for our needs. I have stayed in hotels in Auburn previously but this was so much better and more relaxing. Will book again if I get the opportunity.

We were pleasantly surprised that Tim's bnb turned out to be our favorite one yet. We explored the Finger Lakes and finished our trip in Auburn. This house is so relaxing; there is a warm energy you will get from this place. Maybe the ancient beech trees that surround the house? Super walkable to downtown. Extremely cozy bed (took pictures of the mattress before I left). Hot shower. Quiet. And Tim's instructions were crystal clear! We plan to see Finger Lakes every year so we will be back! PS- You must try Angelo's pizza in town. Delish!
Cute place near downtown. Was nice to be able to walk to dinner and around town.
Had a great time and the stay was perfect and cozy. Will definitely stay again next time I visit.
very clean and hassle free
Amazing place to stay, would recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay in Auburn. This property is in a very convenient location, close to some attractions and the grocery store, while remaining peaceful. The house is gorgeous and the decor was beautiful, it was a real treat to stay here!
We really enjoyed our stay and will be back to explore the surrounding area! The place felt very cozy and Timothy was very responsive!
Timothy communicated fast very helpful and friendly would stay again. Beautiful home and clean!!
Clean, refreshing, and beautiful. Wonderful stay and responsive and kind host! Loved the addition of the side deck with the swing chair! Great space for sunsets and early morning coffee.
Had a great time. Everything's was as described. Had a peaceful atmosohere and helped as a relaxing backdrop

We had a great stay at Timothy’s apartment. We brought our infant and dog and everyone had a comfortable stay. The bed was very comfy and the place was clean and had everything we needed. The area is very walkable with a stroller.
Had a pleasant stay. The house was beautiful and clean.
Quaint and clean. Enjoyable stay all around. Thank you
This stay was exactly as pictured, a very charming apartment! Very close to downtown and only 15 minutes from Skaneateles. Very comfortable stay and would recommend to others.
amazing if you're thinking about booking. DO IT
This was one of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed in. The home is absolutely beautiful and Timothy is an amazing host. The fireplace was such a nice touch as well.
Cute place!
Great spot very close to town. We enjoyed our stay.
Beautiful apartment. Loved staying here!
Tim is so nice and helpful! The apartment is newly renovated, but retained the home’s Victorian charm. It is spacious, and decorated with great taste. Saved to my favorites!
Great location, walking distance to all the good restaurants and bars. Will be a repeat customer.
Great stay for my daughter’s wedding at Emerson Park. Beautiful space!
Super cute place! It was a great location if you’re looking to go to Auburn or Skaneateles
We had a great stay! The place was absolutely beautiful! Totally recommend

We loved staying at this wonderful Airbnb! The beds were very comfortable, everything updated, clean and beautiful like the pictures! You are right in the downtown and parking on the street was very easy. Great coffee and bagels on the same block as well as restaurants and a large grocery store Wegman's a minute away. Also very quiet considering where it's located. Two full baths was the best and the hosts were so friendly and accommodating! We came in for a wedding at Skaneateles which was 12 min away. We loved the area and would easily stay again!

Great space for us to get together with friends at. We loved gathering and munching on snacks around the big island. The fire place was great and easy to use! Every room was very spacious and had great light from outside. Beds were super comfy. We loved walking around the corner to Prison City Pub- as it was the reason for our visit! Our host gave great directions and check out tasks were the shortest list I have ever had at a place.
Fun spot to stay in Auburn. We'd definitely stay again next time we are in town.
We loved our stay at the prison loft. Came to town for the eclipse and really enjoyed getting to know the city.
Great place. Exactly as pictured and cozy.

This is my third time staying at the PC lofts and it is such a convenient location to go do things in Auburn. Both of the lofts are close to restaurants, bars and stores. I love staying here for a date night away or a girls night.

Dawns place is beautiful and the style of the loft is very modern. I loved the view from the balcony door, the beds were so comfortable and it was in walking distance of some good restaurant/bars. I definitely recommend and would stay here again.
Great place to stay up to date house

The loft was amazing! Clean, comfortable and close to everything. We were in town for a wedding and needed to change/freshen up after traveling and Dawn was flexible on check-in ... so grateful!!! We had a wonderful time - loved the loft!!!! We will definately stay there again when we're in the area. I would recommend giving it a try...you won't be disappointed. Thank you!!!!
Everything was as promised. Great place! Quiet. Relaxing. Comfortable.
Staying at Loft #3 was a great experience! It was extremely clean and beautifully decorated. There was lots of space on both floors. We will be back again!

a great central location in the city of Auburn. We stayed the night for my rehearsal dinner and got ready for my wedding the next morning. The loft is even more spacious than anticipated! Beds were comfortable, quiet at night, and nice views to look out at in the morning. All of the necessities were provided which made the stay even better. I recommend staying if you're in town!
Perfect spot for a wedding weekend in Skaneateles. Great host.

Dawn’s place was terrific! Exactly as described in the listing. It is an ideal location next to bars, restaurants, and grocery stores. I loved the extra touches: laundry detergent, extra towels, full-length mirrors, and a Keruig machine. There are no elevators, so be mindful that there are steep stairs. I highly recommend Dawn’s Place and would stay there again!
Beautiful, bright, clean, modern space. Would stay again for sure!
The unit was exactly as advertised. Beds were very comfortable. The entire place was impeccably clean. Would recommend 😃
100% would stay again. This was the perfect place to have our bridal party stay during our wedding weekend!

Apartment was amazing. Everyone in my party really enjoyed it. Very modern. Great location near some great restaurants and brew pubs. Even walking distance to a local grocery store. All the amenities you need. Would gladly stay again when in the area.
Dawns space was the perfect place to visit with friends I haven’t seen in a long time. Spacious, clean and cozy!
Dawn was helpful and allowed us to check in early. The place is large -2 stories- with plenty of room to spread out and have your own space! Bedding was high quality and very comfortable.
Great stay in downtown Auburn. The Prison City Lofts are a great addition to accommodation options when visiting my hometown. Will definitely stay again!

A fabulous loft in the center of Auburn, surrounded by bars & restaurants. Beautifully decorated & furnished apartment and brilliantly equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Immaculately clean. This is the third time I’ve stayed in these lofts & it’s my 1st go to when visiting my son & grandson in Owasco.

The place was immaculate. The location is right downtown and makes things very walkable.
The only downside is the stairs. They are a little tough but we managed.
I would definitely stay there again!
Great place right in Downtown Auburn. Walking distance to many restaurants. Highly recommend.

Dawn and the hosts were extremely accommodating for our weekend stay. The space is sprawling and the finishes are lovely. The location is perfect within walking distance of the grocery store and all locals bars and restaurants. Auburn is a close ride to Skaneateles where we had an event and visited their downtown and a winery. Cannot recommend this loft enough, great value for all that you get!

We stayed here with family for a nearby wedding and the place couldn’t have been more perfect! Lots of space to gather and hang out, spacious bedrooms, clean bathrooms and much more! Close by to hotels associated with the wedding, as well as walkable to nearby restaurant. 10 minute drive to Skaneateles with lots to do. Easy check in and responsive host, would definitely consider staying here again if we are back in this area!
Nice, well kept place! Very comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Nice property that seems to have been redone recently. Parking was on the street but never difficult to get a spot right in front. This property worked well for our family visiting extended family and various sights in the area.
We had an absolutely great time here. Pubs and breweries within walking distance, ice cream shop next door. loved it.

No soap in the showers!
And would have liked a coffee maker other than Keurig.
Really enjoyed the apartment. Was plenty big enough for four adults.

This hidden gem was exactly as pictured and better than described. It was perfect for me and three friends to spend an evening catching up. Restaurants and groceries within walking distance. Each of us had our own separate bed and the mattresses were sooooo comfortable. The loft was spotless and the only thing we didn’t like was having to leave!!!
Will definitely stay here again.
It was perfect.
Our stay was great! It was the perfect choice for our weekend in Auburn.
I would highly recommend!
The flat is truly beautiful.
Modern and aesthetic. Very comfortable beds. Great location.

Great place to stay! We will be back. The pics were very accurate, the loft was clean, well furnished and stocked. What pleasantly surprised me was the peaceful and home feel the place had that you can’t see in pics.
We even made a whole meal and it felt like cooking at home.
We never had any issues with noise, either from the building or street. The parking was convenient. We used street parking since our need was mostly for overnight, but we would use the parking garage across the street if we needed it during times with more restrictions.
The host and staff were easy to communicate with and even sought me out to ensure we had everything we needed. Highly recommend.
Beautiful place!! Photos were beautiful but it was even better in person!
Great place to stay in the heart of auburn!
This place just screams home! It’s comfy and modern with a great location for fun!
A beautiful, modern apartment that is perfect for a family.
Great spot, modern vibe.
Super Cute Loft, Dawn was very accommodating, helpful, flexible and super responsive. will definitely book for another stay.

Dawn's place was fabulous. Beautifully decorated and furnished. Had all the necessities for a wonderful girl's getaway. Beds were very comfortable and the space was perfect for our group of 5. Would definitely stay again :)
This spot was great. Super cute & clean! Had everything we needed. Lots of places close by to walk to!
Beautiful place!
Everything was great for our stay. The lifts are nice and Dawn for a great host

Second time staying here and it is always above expectations! Dawn goes above and beyond, everything is just as it looks in the pictures, so clean and feels like home when you walk in. The location is incredible and within walking distance to coffee, food, entertainment, etc. she even left a little charcuterie board for us to enjoy!! Will definitely be back if I am in town!

The loft was beautiful and located in a great spot. Although we were unaware most restaurants and bars were closed on Tuesday’s we luckily found a few hidden gems.
We would stay here again!

We really enjoyed the decor of this place and it's ability to sleep our entire party of 4 in separate beds (which were quite comfortable). We experienced a few maintenance issues that were shared with the owner, probably come as part of a reno in an old building, such as neither bathroom door shut tightly and the front door would get stuck on the sloping floor making it open/close quite hard. This condo is located on a busy main street so expect some street level noise but nothing too disruptive. We came for a girls spa weekend and this place was conveniently located to the lots of restaurants in both Auburn and the neighboring Skaneateles and a short drive to the amazing Spa at the Inns of Aurora (would highly recommend).
This was a great place for a family of five during the winter. Clean, modern and comfortable. We will return when we visit my parents again in the future.

Dawn's listing was exactly as described. The location was 6 miles from our destination to enjoy a Dicken's Christmas weekend. Cabin is spotless and well appointed. Very quiet and nice view of the lake. Joe and Crystina are very responsive. Would gladly stay here again.

Great cozy little cabin. Love all the amenities including the fireplace. Close to town.

The cabin was wonderful - lovely location with a beautiful lake view and perfectly cozy atmosphere. Joe and Crystina are great hosts and the cabin is charming. I would definitely stay again if I come back to the Auburn area.

Great hosts, great location, great cabin.

The place is gorgeous, you can see the lake which is breath taking and the hosts were flexible , and responded really fast . Will come again .

Great place! Great hosts!

Awesome cabin and awesome views. Loved this getaway!

Stay at this COZY cabin! It has wonderful updates (the bathroom looks like it was recently renovated) so it really gives you the best of both worlds. A perfect getaway.

Perfect place for a couple or family to visit the finger lakes region of New York. Joe and Crystina were very accomadating and helpful in finding places to eat and enjoy in close by Auburn. Would love to come back in the summer.

Joe and Crystina's cabin near the lake was a fantastic place to base our Finger Lakes exploration and a lovely place to stay and relax.

Nice place with lake view

My daughter and I had a great stay in the log cabin. Everything we needed was provided, the cabin was clean, and the views were spectacular. Location was perfect for all the surrounding areas we visited. Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay! They are great hosts that think of everything.

This was the perfect spot to stay during our weekend getaway in the Auburn area! It is conveniently located and the neighborhood is quaint and relaxing. Joe & Crystina were always friendly and willing to accommodate our needs.

This is such a cute cabin! Stayed with 2 other friends, so there were 3 of us. The beds were comfortable and the whole place was cozy. The kitchen is nicely stocked and there is a washer and dryer. I highly recommend it.
The owners were great! They have a fantastic place, great view and location. Will definitely go back!
This cabin is cozy and charming with a view of the lake. It sleeps six well, has a deck and a grill. It’s a good location to drive to either Auburn or Skaneateles and the lakes.

Perfect cabin!

We loved this quaint cabin! It was perfect for our trip to town for visiting family! Not a detail was forgotten from the basics in the fridge to the extra pillows, towels, and toiletries for us! A place I would highly recommend!

The log cabin on Burtis Point on Owasco Lake was a pleasant experience. All was as described, there were no unfortunate surprises or disappointments. Joe and Crystina’s cabin is great. Super clean, very comfortable and very relaxing. Simple with all one might need. New kitchen and bathroom fixtures in a traditional Upstate NY lakeside cabin. The beds were very comfortable. Our hosts were very discreet and yet very responsive. We had a wonderful time.

Cozy cabin close to Cayuga Lake wine trail with beautiful view of Lake Owasco. It was the perfect place for us to kick back and relax after a day at the wineries! Plenty of room for two couples. Joe and Crystina are great hosts and respond quickly to messages. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Great hosts with such a beautiful place and location. Hoping to go back in the future!
If you're looking for a great place to stay and relax for a weekend this is the place. We love hitting all our favorite wineries and come back to a nice fire.

Cozy, comfortable and great hosts!

Anyone visiting the Auburn area should definitely consider this cabin. Very comfortable and far above and beyond what a hotel stay could provide. Joe was great with communication. Would return in a heartbeat.
This was our first AirBnB experience and it was spectacular!! All of the thoughtful touches, cozy cabin itself, and their responsiveness made it truly a great stay. Highly recommended!!

Loved the place! The Log Cabin is cute and charming while also clean and has neat touches that made the stay incredibly pleasant (e.g. really nice bathrooms!). The atmosphere that the cabin provided added a lot to our Finger Lakes experience this past weekend!
Cabin was perfect for a winter weekend getaway. Great amenities, extremely clean, wonderful hosts. Loved sitting by the fire watching the snow on the lake! Peaceful, private, and cozy.

Joe & Crystina’s cabin was a great getaway for our group of 4 single ladies!! The home is cozy and inviting and the kitchen is very well stocked. Nice and clean! Plenty of towels! Added little gesture from Joe and Crystina in which they left us eggs, milk, and bread for our first morning breakfast! We really loved our time here, and we definitely recommend it for anyone visiting the area!
We had an excellent weekend in Owasso. Everything was just as described, and the location was beautiful this time of year. We world highly recommend and would absolutely stay again.

Great location and wonderful hosts! the home was very clean and ready for us upon arrival! I highly recommend!

The cabin was adorable and very clean and comfortable! Joe and Crystina are amazing, thoughtful hosts and I am looking forward to coming back!
Joe and Crystina's place was so clean and inviting! Would definitely come back!

very nice cabin. nice quiet location with a very nice view of the lake yet still close to all.

Joe and Cristina were the perfect hosts. Their cabin was perfect and well provisioned. They provided everything we needed for the weekend. Joe and Crystina’s place was a perfect choice for our time upstate. The cabin is lovely, clean and very spacious. Joe and Crystina were wonderful hosts had great suggestions and very quick to respond to our emails. It's a beautiful cabin with everything you need, if you want to cook or grill out. We loved having the fireplace to enjoy .

Joe and Crystina did such a nice job of turning a regular little cabin into someplace cute and comfortable. Well stocked kitchen, plenty of towels, and everything was so clean-even those pesky corners that seem to collect dust! They were very flexible and friendly to work with.

The cabin was perfect for our girls reunion. It was very clean with all the comforts of home . Location was close to Auburn and Skaneatles. Joe & Crystina's cabin was absolutely perfect for us 3 couples meeting up after a long time. LOVED the fireplace and view of the lake- Beds were so comfy- cooked a lot and ate by the fire. Cannot say enough good things! HIGLY RECOMMEND and will be back in the future.
Very cozy place with cute artwork on the wall

We had a great time at the log cabin! The space was adorable and full of charm - just like the pictures. It was spotless and we we were very happy there.

We unfortunately got to arrive only late at night and leave early next day.. But it was a comfortable stay.. Joe and Crystina had the place clean and stocked with basic provisions for a quick breakfast.. The water heater was off by mistake and it was just a matter of finding the mains and turning it on.. Otherwise it was very smooth and we'd love to comeback and stay for a longer time. Loved the view of the lake from the living room was great early in the morning..

This was a great place to stay. Very accurate to the pictures. The host was extremely nice and tried to accommodate every request. Staples were provided in case we got in late at night, and everything was so clean. And the house, with the view of the lake, was exactly what I want in a vacation home. Loved this stay!

The cabin was lovely and even better than the photos depicted. Our hosts were easy to reach for any questions we had. We will definitely be book this place again during our next visit to the finger lakes.

We loved our stay at this truly cozy cabin. The hosts provided some basic groceries for us. The house had plenty of sleeping room and a warm fireplace which was stocked with wood. Hosts were very responsive to all communication.

Love it when the host understates how wonderful his place is. Loved the house and will return as soon as possible. Instructions and communication were first rate. Spotless and so many little touches to make for a comfy visit. Many thanks!
A great overnight stay while traveling through Syracuse for a story. Highly recommend!

Amazing place and great hosts! Not only were my questions answered almost immediately but they provided me with so much info I barely had to ask anything. Bread milk and eggs in the fridge and everything you could want was provided for us. The pics of the cabin are great but do no justice. If u have the opportunity you will not be disappointed at all!!

We enjoyed our stay so much the first time that we came back the next weekend! Everything was great again! Joe met us upon arrival, already had a fire going inside, and left a note welcoming us back. I highly recommend this listing for anyone looking to get away.

Joe and Crystina have a great cabin by Owasco Lake! Everything was as described in the listing with little touches here and there to make you feel at home. A fire was already built, the bathroom was stocked with commonly forgotten items (shampoo, body wash, toothbrush, toothpaste, etc.), the kitchen was well stocked and even had breakfast necessities (bread, eggs, butter, pancake mix, etc.), and the wifi was seamless - a BIG plus for me.

We enjoyed sitting by the fire to watch the sunset over the lake from the comfort of the living room. The town of Auburn is only 5-10 minutes away with a Wegmans and some choices for restaurants and bars. The town of Skaneateles is about 10-15 minutes away with more choices for restaurants.

All in all, we had a great stay, and we will definitely be back!

What a great experience!

My girlfriend and I wanted a romantic valentines day retreat, and this cabin on Owasco Lake was the perfect destination! Joe & Crystina were an absolute pleasure to work with. They provided all the info and amenities we needed to have a perfect stay!

The cabin was in a beautiful location, and is certainly cozy, but not small at all. Everything was so comfortable, the fireplace was great, and the view of the lake was breathtaking against the snowy backdrop.

The cabin itself has everything one would need for a multi-night stay! We cooked a several course meal in the fully-appointed kitchen, and enjoyed it at the beautiful dining room table while watching the fire.

J&C are obviously experienced hosts, and were able to provide one of the smoothest AirBnb experiences I have ever had! I HIGHLY recommend this cabin for anyone looking for a delightful time in the perfect winter/summer destination.

We had a terrific stay at Joe and Crystina's beautiful log cabin for a weekend retreat. The place is so warm and cozy. We could not have been more impressed with how communicative and welcoming Joe and Crystina were for us. If you're looking for a great lake-side cabin with all the comforts of home and more, this is your place. We hope everyone can enjoy this little slice of cabin heaven like we did!

We REALLY loved our stay at this Beautiful Cottage by the lake. Our hosts were considerate and thoughtful. The Cottage was much more than we expected, and I don't think the listing pictures do it justice. More than a cabin, with completely modern Kitchen and baths, so well equipped, nothing was needed but the clothes you wear. From eggs and milk and coffee and Butter in the stocked kitchen, to new toothbrushes and soaps and shampoos and lotions in the baths, no need has been overlooked. Air mattresses and plenty of blankets and pillows would make this the PERFECT destination for large families and groups. The hosts called us 3 or 4 times to offer service or inquire if we needed anything at all, but other than that, we enjoyed COMPLETE privacy. The Fire was prepared and there was a large stack of firewood, kindling and paper next to the hearth to make it easy to enjoy nights by the fire. There is individual electric heat in almost every room, making it a cozy winter stay.. What a GREAT value, and so much better than a Hotel room for 2 couples (or more). We will DEFINITELY return, and recommend this place to our friends.

Beautiful house!! Very easy to find and detailed instructions on how to get in!! Loved the breakfast nook and back patio!! Very clean all throughout the house!! Quiet, friendly neighborhood added to the perfect getaway!!! We did nickname the cellar stairs Blarney Castle since we've all climbed those and knew better than to attempt them lol

Jennie's place was exactly as described and as seen in the pictures. It was spotless and comfortable, right in the heart of town, within easy distance of parks, playgrounds, restaurants and amenities. Would highly recommend and would stay again.
Jennie was such an amazing host. We were staying in the area for my grandfather’s funeral and the Airbnb was a wonderful place to recharge and relax during our stay. Would definitely stay again!
Would stay again if available. It was a great stay.

The house was welcoming and warm. Neighborhood quiet, clean and safe. All needed amenities were available, beautiful Kitchen, and comfortable relaxing space for our group of four. Easy access to visit surrounding lakes and quaint small towns. Everything was better than expected!!!!

We have stayed twice before, always a wonderful experience and it just feels like home (away from home). Cozy, warm spaces that give you flexibility and comfort allowing you to relax and enjoy, a "retreat" type space. We have been in Auburn for a nice dinner @ Balloons Restaurant with our friends, this space provides a wonderful chance to relax together. A real Super Host place...

We had a great stay! Comfy cozy beds. Plenty of heat for a cold Thanksgiving week. We had fun playing the family-friendly games available in the house. Jennie is very responsive. we reached out about a small problem with an appliance. She replied immediately with a solution.
We enjoyed our stay and will likely stay again the next time we're in Auburn.
We loved staying here again. It’s a great place to be able to relax at in Auburn.
Lots of little unexpected surprises - like the toasty heater in the bathroom, some food items already in the pantry and fridge, and lots of decor items with quotes or other sayings.
The house was perfect for our stay. The place was clean and we felt right at home. Convenient location to many of the local activities. Would definitely recommend.

Before we even checked in, Jennie allowed us the flexibility to check-in early, which was welcome after over 24hrs of travelling. The house was super cozy with everything you will need for your stay. The location was perfect with only a 10 minute drive to Skaneateles and the beautiful lakes. The beds were super comfortable and the street very quiet. We would highly recommend.

Jennie's house was perfect for discovering the Finger Lakes region. We very much appreciated the pasta and tomato sauce welcome package as well as Jennie's clear instructions to get in the house. It made it easy for us to settle in after a long drive from Boston! The house looks like in the pictures and was spacious enough for the 6 of us. Bonus: there is plenty of entertainment options if you have kids!

The house was in a nice residential area and easy to find. Outdoor space was nice for morning coffee. Inside had room for all. I enjoyed the chairs by the front windows reading. Was a quiet location. Very convenient to Syracuse and Skaneateles.

We had a great time at Jennie's place in Auburn, location is just a few minutes from downtown in a nice, quiet neighborhood. The house is very charming, nicely laid out, well stocked in the kitchen (we appreciated the coffee, almond milk, syrup, and spices) and communications with the owner were prompt and easy. The house has a lot of old charm and character and is well put together and homey. We would definitely come back here, great find! Thanks for the service to Jennie!

The restored retreat worked well for our family vacation with our adult children. We were able to explore Auburn and many state parks in the Finger lake area. The house was very welcoming and comfortable.
Jennie's place was great. My son loved finding the little cars, they made him feel at home.
The house had all the basic amenities and a quiet neighborhood. Beds were comfy and towels were laid out and ready for guests in each room. Price was decent for the area.

Had a lovely stay with family at Jennie’s restored retreat. House was exactly as pictured. Very cozy and cute place in a nice neighborhood. Jennie was very accommodating as a host. Great location as nearby skaneateles, Watkins Glen, or Ithaca are only a short drive away. Would definitely recommend.
What a beautiful retreat in Auburn, NY. The home is spacious and lovely. The kitchen was well stocked and a complimentary meal was left on the counter. Jennie was a great host.
Great place to stay!

We had a very pleasant stay! The few issues we had come up were minor and Jennie was incredibly responsive too and offered to fix right away.
We would recommend this place for someone looking for a cozy place to stay.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the house in Auburn. The house is very comfortable, clean and felt like home. Auburn was a good location fairly close to fun tourist destinations as well as to the Thruway, airport and train station, and the house is on a pleasant, quiet street.
Cute! Comfy beds, clean, just what we needed!
Jennie’s home was perfect for us to visit and welcome our new nephew into this world! We would definitely stay again!

Very cute house, kitchen was super well stocked! We were very happy
Lovely and cozy house..so very clean and bright. Quiet location with friendly neighbor, and so close to wegmans and the heart of town. Quick 20min walk to the restaurants and bars, we loved our stay!

Our family stay at this charming retreat was really smooth. The Location is amazing . It’s on a Charming street near a lovely Park, Coffee shops groceries and History ( Harriet Tubman Residential / women civil right) all within a 5-10 min car ride. 20 min from Skaneateles village and the Lake/ boating. An old fashioned drive-in theater at the town limit.
Jennie was extremely accommodating and responded quickly to questions . The house comes with a fully loaded kitchen making staying in for dinner after a long day of exploring a breeze. We really took advantage of the gas grill. We especially enjoyed the board games, DVD’s and the Lego bucket for the kids.

Everything was lovely! The space was well appointed and cozy. Great location. Minor thing: The AC didn’t seem to work upstairs which made sleeping quite hot on some nights. Downstairs the AC was very effective. We really enjoyed our stay overall.
Convenient location in Auburn. Close to grocery stores and a quick drive to the lake!

We were able to book last minute for a great long weekend family getaway in May to the Finger Lakes. The restored retreat was old in a good way and nice and neat. Looks small outside but plenty of room inside. My lady loved it. We stayed in the rooms with the queen beds and they were comfy! The tower fans in the bedrooms were very much appreciated and the living room has nice chairs and Netflix— what more do you need? Auburn is a cute little town (the restaurants close early like 8pm) which we weren’t used to in the five boroughs so we found ourselves at Prison City Brewery (really good) twice! We enjoyed seeing all the pretty houses, some great exhibits at the Schweinfurth Art Center and loved our visit to New Hope Mills Cafe (delicious). Not to mention we spent an entire day eating, shopping, and sightseeing at beautiful Skaneateles Lake which is just a short drive away. Tip: Don’t be too far back in the line for the boat tour otherwise you’ll end up sitting out of earshot of the captain’s voice and you will learn no Skaneateles facts… A wonderful weekend nonetheless. We were very grateful for Auburn and the restored retreat, thanks Jennie!
This house was perfect for my sisters winery themed bachelorette weekend! It was very clean, nicely updated, and overall perfect! We would definitely stay here again!

What an adorable home! We rented this home for family as we celebrated our daughter's college graduation. It was clean, beautifully decorated and filled with everything we could possibly need. The location was easily accessible and a great home base for our busy weekend. Loved the space in kitchen and dining area! Thank you for sharing this restored retreat!

Such a great experience at Jennie’s house! Everything was very clean and well stocked giving us everything we needed and more! She even provided us with a few kid friendly features for our son. Highly recommend!
Nice quiet neighborhood, house was nice and clean

Her house was beautiful. The beds were like clouds. I have always loved the Victorian style houses. The dining room was amazing. Over all it was home. Thank you so much for letting us grieve there. Couldn’t have been more at home.
The place is bigger than it looks in photos. Very clean, comfortable, and set up for a cozy weekend with family or friends. Everything was easy and accessible to getting in and out. Close to town.

the place was as advertised; very comfortable with all the things you need to feel at home while away. It was very very cold while we stayed but the fireplace gave us a warm feel and we stayed cozy and warm.

We had planned to do a puzzle at the table but it was too chilly to sit there for an extended time. (We were there on a particularly frigid weekend so probably not an issue most of the year.) On the plus side, there is a nice heat lamp in the bathroom upstairs and we had plenty of hot water for showers.

Perfect accommodations. This was our second time staying at Jennie's and it was just as wonderful as the first. The home is exactly as described and more. It was warm and inviting with holiday touches added throughout for the winter season. Very thoughtful! We truly enjoyed our stay and hope to back again.
Perfectly restored Victorian charmer! Clean, well-equipped and cozy. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely look to stay at this location again.
This place was exactly what we needed. They even had a personal note to us on arrival. Highly recommend this place.

Our stay at the Restored Retreat was perfect. It was a chilly weekend so we immediately warmed up with the fireplace! The overall vibe of the house was perfect for a weekend get away. The location is central to main roads needed to get to downtown Auburn, Skaneateles or any other surrounding towns you may be looking to visit. Highly recommend!!! We look forward to coming back!

Great place! Very nicely decorated and beautiful touches like a welcoming card and some food to eat. If you are in auburn for a wedding or a over night it’s a great place to stay! Very close to Wegmans and Emerson park.

Jennie’s place is great. It’s close to downtown Auburn and just a short drive to Skaneateles. Our reason for the trip was to attend a wedding in Skaneateles. Great host and great house, easy choice!

Jennie was a wonderful host and the house was great! The other guests kept commenting on how cute the house was. Lots to do around the area as well! I will definitely stay here again if I’m back in the area :)
Beautiful and charming house. We had a great stay and would recommend it to anyone.

The relaxing retreat is an amazing stay in Auburn, NY. In a nice queit neighborhood, close to a lovely park for walking and feeding ducks. Close to any type of convenience you may need. My family and I had a wonderful stay and loved enjoying breakfast together in the lovely sun breakfast nook. Jennie is super quick to respond and lovely to chat with on any questions I had. I highly recommend!

The definition of hospitality and warmth!
This retreat will make you feel at home from the moment you walk through the front door! When my family walked in we immediately wanted to walk into each room to see all the little details! The love and care that Jennie pours out into her home will have you sharing this retreat with everyone you know and planning your next visit back!!

This was our second stay at Jennie’s place and we loved it just as much as the first! In fact, we have already booked our third stay. The house is cozy, beautifully decorated, and extremely clean. Great Experience! Very spacious, clean, had snacks and restaurant recommendations, excellent WIFI for when I needed to do work from the AirBNB, and legos my kids could use and help reduce the constant fighting! Excellent experience, would go back again and recommend to anyone

We loved our stay at this adorably decorated and incredibly clean house! Jennie is a fantastic hostess who added thoughtful touches to our stay such as fresh flowers and a welcome note. My three kids loved the house, the backyard, and nearby playground. We would definitely stay here again.
We really enjoyed our stay at the Restored Retreat! It was a perfect spot for us to hang out while we were in town for a wedding. It was close to a Wegmans and some cute shops.

Impressively clean and we were also impressed by the excellent kitchen which is very well equipped. Broadband was good enough that we were both able to work remotely without any problems for some of our stay. Overall highly recommended.

This charmingly appointed house was perfect for a stay in Auburn; very clean and comfortable and has everything you could need. I️ would 100% recommend a stay here.
Hosts were extremely accommodating and very quick to respond with any questions. Also, they left an ample supply of M&M’s – you don’t get that kind of value just anywhere, folks!

We loved our getaway to the restored retreat! Wonderful recommendations provided ahead of time for us to go snowshoe and enjoy the winter weather! Cozy home that allowed us to rest and enjoy. Perfect location to wineries and Wegmans! Thank you!
Very cozy house with thoughtful touches. We were a group of 5 friends and we had a great time!.😊 Thanks Jennie!

Charming, comfortable older house for a short or extended stay in the Finger Lakes area. Nice decorative touches throughout. We had 4 adults and 2 small children staying together quite comfortably for meals, sleeping, playing games/ watching TV in the front room- or playing in the grassy backyard. Recommended.

This cozy home is perfect for a getaway in the cutest neighborhood! Clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed for our stay. Perfect location to explore the finger lakes. We had a great girls weekend in this space and would highly recommend! Thanks Jeannie!

Very comfortable and cozy renovated house. Kids loved the bunk bed (although it was a little squeaky when they wiggled around). Loved staying here! Great space! Very comfortable beds and bedding! Local to the town and close to everything. Very clean. Will definitely come back to this house again.
This was our second stay at Jennie’s place and it was just as wonderful as the first! Highly recommend.

We had a lovely stay at Jennie’s. House was very clean and bright! Had everything we needed....very well done. Jennie was extremely responsive.
A wonderful place to stay! This home was perfect for our family visit to Auburn. It is spacious, inviting, clean, and has everything you need to feel right at home.

Jennie's place was exactly what we needed for our family, including young children. It was very comfortable, well stocked, and had many thoughtful touches. A pleasure to stay in this welcoming home. Jennie was very responsive with any questions I had.

You will expect a beautiful, cleaned, organized, renovated , spacious and quiet location. A lot of useful information about where to get things and eat. The best experience I’ve ever had on AirBnb. Tony is perfect with communication and this place is lovely.

Great place to base your adventures from. Ithica, Rochester, Syracuse, Seneca Falls; all were wonderful places to explore and we loved each. Perfect house if you are visiting Auburn. Can't ask for a better location or a better host.

The place was perfect for our long weekend! There were many options within driving distance and the property was very relaxing/quiet! Tony was very accommodating and thorough, offering recommendations and ease to communicate with. We can’t wait to stay again!

If you’re alone or a couple looking for clean, comfortable, and convenient lodging, this is the one. Next time I head to Auburn, I’ll be checking Tony’s listing for availability before I do anything else.

The stay was fantastic! The place was clean, and Tony was very hospitable.
Great comfortable place, the hosts have thought of everything.

Great location, cozy, and clean. Thanks for the great stay, Tony!

The Auburn cottage is beautiful, clean, quiet and convenient. The backyard is a peaceful waterfront view. We were visiting family in the area, but had a chance to spend an evening with a glass of wine on the seasonal enclosed porch. We had a wonderful stay and will be back.

Just wow! We booked this lovely place for our wedding weekend. It was lovely in every way and we already want to go back for a future anniversary. Tony was wonderful. Perfect little place to see Auburn and Skaneateles. Great location - can’t wait to visit again!

Tony's cottage is beautifully decorated. The bed is very comfortable. We really enjoyed staying here. Tony even went out of his way to drive my phone charger to me when I had left it behind! Very good experience.

Great spot with beautiful sun room, and fully stocked with anything you would need. Tony’s place was perfect for our stay. He was very communicative throughout our stay. The place was clean and comfortable and the view from the sun porch was beautiful.
Tony’s place was a quiet relaxing spot. The sun room is a highlight, even in the rain! Highly recommended!
We loved the apt and will recommend it to family. So quiet and charming.

Tony's place was great! It was a perfect spot to relax between planned family reunion events. The setting was beautiful, right on the river. And, super close to Lake Owasco. Tony and Lisa did such an amazing job hosting my husband and I for our anniversary. They included some very thoughtful touches and responded any time we needed help! This is our second time staying with them and will defintely be back again hopefully more than once next year!

Tony has it going on. The accommodations are as described and we always enjoy our stay. Tony is friendly and offers local recommendations for dining, entertainment and relaxation. We always stay here when in Upstate New York.
Tony’s was great and quick to respond. We really loved this place. It felt like we are at home.
Absolutely lovely, comfortable, stylish cottage apartment in a beautiful setting. Very quiet and private. Short easy drive to the sites and restaurants in Auburn and Skaneateles.

An absolute gem! Really nice space and luxurious linens. Especially loved the sun room. Tony and Lisa were consummate hosts and helped us resolve a need (forgot to pack an important item for an event) we had before we even arrived! highly recommend and would stay again.

My girlfriend and I had a wonderful time that more then exceeded all expectations we had. Tony was a wonderful host with a perfect balance of communication and privacy. We had a great time at the cottage apartment! Tony left a personalized note with lots of great recommendations for both restaurants and activities. Both Tony and Lisa were very helpful and communicative before and during our stay.

What a fabulous spot! And Tony (and Lisa) constantly check in to make sure your stay is beyond wonderful. I hope I get to come back and stay again. Just lovely!!!
What a great find! Very cute and well appointed cottage. We will be back!
This our second time staying at Tony’s and both visits have been excellent! Meticulously clean and a perfect location that is central to all of the Finger Lakes attractions.
Great place to stay while visiting Auburn, New York.
Tony is a first rate host and his cottage is very pleasant and comfortable. Five stars all the way around!

Absolutely adorable apartment on a quiet river. Spotlessly clean and they provide thoughtful amenities in the kitchen, such as oil and salt and pepper, among other spices. Perfect for a couples getaway! Just let’s you relax and de-stress. Tony and Lisa are wonderful hosts.

We would definitely stay here again. Tony and his cousin Lisa are great hosts.
Highly recommend Tony's place. Setting is beautiful with access to river and bed is super comfy

This was a perfect place for our weekend in Auburn. The apartment was stylishly decorated with every amenity that we needed. Tony was very responsive in providing information that we needed. I wish we could have spent more time at this great location. Thanks again Tony for your hospitality.

this is a lovely place for a couple to relax and enjoy the area comfortable clean beautiful with many homey touches

5 stars - would definitely recommend.

Great location in a quiet neighborhood, very convenient to the Merry Go Round Theater. The cottage is perfectly laid out and beautifully decorated! Tony and Lisa were fantastic hosts. The area has lots to see and do nearby. I highly recommend if you're looking for R&R! We'll be back!

We had the most wonderful stay at Tony and his co-host Lisa's apartment! This place is unbelievable! The pictures don't do it justice. The apartment is large, decorated beautifully, and very clean. The backyard was amazing! Tony's place is clean, quiet and comfortable. The photos are accurate and he was a helpful and responsible host. Would definitely stay here again.

Very cozy, private and comfortable cottage with a tranquil back yard area that allows access to a beautiful water area. I highly recommend if in the Auburn area and especially if you are visiting the Merry Go Round Playhouse! Just minutes away from the playhouse.

Tony's place is very well designed. The location along the river is very peaceful and close to food and very close to the Marry-go-round theater. Communication with Tony about check in and check out was excellent. Everything is as described. It's definitely a good value.

Tony's place was quiet, private, clean, and beautifully decorated. My fiancé and I had a wonderful time staying at Tony's place. Everything went smoothly from check in to check out and both Lisa and Tony were easily accessible. The place was cute and cozy and a perfect location for exploring the nearby finger lakes and local wineries.

We absolutely loved this spot. The home was fully equipped with everything you could possibly need, decorated beautifully!!!! Chill in the sun room or down by the lake. We didn't want to leave. 5 star.

This apartment is adorable. It's comfortable and clean, with an amazing sun room that overlooks the yard. The location is central to several great towns in the Finger Lakes Region. Tony and Lisa are excellent communicators and accommodating hosts. I definitely plan to stay here again!

Tony and Lisa were such fabulous hosts!! Both were so great with answering questions and helping us get checked in. An Airbnb gem!

This place is perfect for every season. I am nestled on the couch looking over the water with snow in the trees and can imagine myself enjoying coffee in the morning on the enclosed porch in the summer. Exceptional communication and fantastic attention to detail!
Tony has a wonderful place. Is quiet and residential, but close to downtown. The amenities are as advertised.
The place was beautiful and clean, our hosts accommodating, and it was perfectly near everything we wanted to do. We'd love to stay again!

My wife and I had a wonderful time. Tony's place was exactly as portrayed in the pictures and description, and it was perfect for two people looking for a romantic getaway. I never actually met the host, however the communication was excellent. The place was exactly as described, nestled on a lightly wooded lot with a river at the far end. It was clean and smelled fresh, with well thought out necessities.

This was our first experience trying out Airbnb and it was absolutely perfect! We made our trip a mini getaway after our wedding day and it fully succeeded our expectations. Tony was a great host and attentive to everything. Place was beautifully decorated with some great art. Compact apartment is perfect for two people. Nice bike ride around Owasco Lake right out the door

Nice, private apartment semi-attached to a larger home. Right near the lake and the wine tasting region. We enjoyed the history of the region more than expected, especially the Seward House. A lovely cozy getaway not to far from any adventure you plan on taking at the finger lakes. Great stay with a great hosts who made us feel right at home definitely recommend :)

Great place to stay for the night! Used it as a place to stay during our vacation/road trip. Lots to do in the surrounding areas and a pretty view from the room. While we didn’t use the fire pit, it was in a very peaceful yard and would have been a great place to sit out at night.
Derek was very accommodating. Great host!
Beautiful space, great host!
Extremely clean and well-done place. I loved it and met Derek the following day. Nice guy!

Was the first time for us to stay at an Airbnb and we couldn’t have been more pleased. Was better then staying at a hotel. The place was private clean and so comfortable. Dereck was super friendly and was a very enjoyable stay. Highly recommend it. Even the books were good!!!

This air bnb was a perfect find for a one night stay for my boyfriend and I. We had a wedding to attend at Emerson Park Pavilion, and Derek’s place was only 5 minutes away. It was so clean and very cozy. Bed was comfortable!

Derek's place was spotless and the hosts were very friendly. Would definitely stay again.

Place was exactly like the pictures! We were in town for a wedding, and this was a perfect location and looked way better than any of the hotels in the area. Would definitely stay there again

really great space, lots of room and big kitchen. we stayed here before our wedding and it was great. Dawn was great with communication.

Perfect getaway for the two of us. Plenty of room, comfortable, and interesting places to eat right nearby (highly recommend the Buffalo chicken pierogis at Prison City Brewery).

I have stayed at the lofts before and both of the spaces are great! Clean, convenient and close to everything you need. Dawn does a great job with the lofts. I will for sure be staying again.
Dawn’s place is great! Very clean and comfortable with lots of thoughtful touches. We had a very cozy stay and will definitely book again on our next trip to Auburn!
Our second stag here and had no issues. Will continue to return in the future. Thanks Dawn!

Great place to stay and great, friendly host who was accommodating! Beautiful space with attention to detail- with everything we needed to cook a family meal and close enough to walk to yummy restaurants.
We had a great weekend stay at the loft. It was a good home base for exploring the area and had everything we needed.
This is our second year staying in the Lofts, and it was just as wonderful. Easy to park, easy to access, clean and very good price.

Dawns place was absolutely perfect! I stayed there for my wedding weekend, and used the space for my bridal party to get ready the day of the wedding. It was the perfect layout. We had a great time and will come back .

Cute place to stay DT with easy access to food and amenities. The apartment was cute, simple, spacious and had all the amenities you need to be comfortable. Wonderful place! Clean, comfy, and communication with the host was great. Easy parking, check in and out. Would recommend.

Extremely spacious, clean, and modern loft apartment directly in the center of all that downtown Auburn has to offer! Great location to tour the Finger Lakes and rest at the end of your day. Photos are accurate and the space is clean. The entrance is above a shop which was never a problem, but the entrance staircase is steep, so be aware if you have mobility issues.

Absolutely beautiful! Check in was smooth, and Dawn was easily reachable with questions. We truly enjoyed our stay!
Great location, great place! Will be back again!
Perfect spot, walked to the wedding we had and some nice little bars and coffee spots!
Great location, right in the heart of Auburn. Loft is super cute, very comfy and spacious! Dawn was an outstanding host.

Dawn was a responsive and thoughtful host and the apartment had everything I needed for a quiet retreat. The kitchen is amazing- perfect for assembling farmers market finds. Loved the electric fireplace after a day out in the chilly November air. Auburn is a great jumping off point for day trips to Skeneateles, Aurora and Seneca Falls. Things to note: the apartment is on a main street so overnight parking is a block away in a parking garage. Also, steepish staircase is a tad tricky for large suitcases. Overall, great place to stay, though!
